It had started out as a normal day for Keiko, Natsuko (Keiko's brown haired friend), and their other friend (the blond haired girl). But it turned out to be different since Yusuke Urameshi had decided to come to school. Natsuko and her other friend had feared Yusuke for a long time and they couldn't understand how Kekio could still be friends with him. There were so many rumors about the bad stuff he had done!

Later on that day, Mr. Takenaka could be heard calling for Yusuke to come to his office. Keiko, who had been separted earlier from then due to different classes, was searching for him. Natsuko and her other friend, however, saw him go to the school roof. At first they were hiding, but then Natsuko started remembering Keiko's dismissals of the rumors before and Keiko's friendship with Yusuke. If Natsuko was truly honest, her biggest fear was that Keiko and Yusuke would get together and get married and then Keiko would be trapped in an unhappy marriage.

It was with this resolve to save Keiko from marrying a terrible person that she summoned up her courage to put Yusuke in his place.
As she headed towards the roof, her friend tried to stop her.

"What are you doing? You know Urameshi is up there!"

"I know that. But it's something I have to do for Keiko's sake," Natsuko replied to her friend's confusion. "Just trust me. Everything will be fine." Natsuko then left her friend as she opened the door to the roof and saw Yusuke just standing there.

Yusuke turned his head and said, "I was expecting Keiko to show when I heard the door."

"Keiko will no doubt check this place eventually, looking for you, but I got here first."

Yusuke looked surprised a bit. Normally she was so afraid of him and nevre really spoe to him much.

"What do you want anyway? Leave me alone."

"No way! I'm here for Keiko. You will not marry her and have Keiko in a terrible marriage! She deserves far better than you!"

"What in the world are you talking about?"

"I just told you. And I'll prove it too. I'll beat you up so badly that Keiko would never want to go out with a weakling like you."

"You can't be serious. You're actually challenging me to a fight."

"Yes I am," said Natsuko as she got in position to fight.

info.description:
A character(s) from Yu Yu Hakusho gets dominated by a female Yu Yu Hakusho character(s). The one who gets dominated can be either male or female, but the one who dominates must be female.

Rules:

1. No males dominate.
2. Give each chapter a decent size. Exceptions are the setup chapters.
3. Give decent grammar. It doesn't have to be perfect, but have it legible.
4. Try not to end a story too short. Keep the stories ongoing as long as you can.
5. Go wild on fetishes.
6. Try not to kill the one who is dominated so as to keep the story going.

If I need to add any more rules, I will. But other than that, have fun!
